column2: pivot_wider(id_cols = c(mark, celltype, feature), names_from = enrichment_type, values_from = fraction_overlapping_mean, names_prefix = "fraction overlapping mean ") %>%
mutate(`log2 of ratio of fraction overlapping cis-hBTLs vs. peaks` = log2(`fraction overlapping mean cis-hBTL` / `fraction overlapping mean peak`))
